title: WTB - Wilkerson “3 mile of broadway” looking south
author: arcadekrazy

posts.post_title: WTB - Wilkerson “3 mile of broadway” looking south
posts.post_content:
Hello,

I am looking for a copy of Thaddeus Wilkerson RPPC #306, “three miles of  broadway, looking south”.  

Paying strong for a nice copy.   Please PM me if you have one, or know of one for sale.   

Thank you.
